{{Description|The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.}}
'''Maiden's Passing Youth''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Maiden Beloved]].

==Description==
A delicate timepiece.<br>It stood as a testament to the inevitable passage of time, indifferent to its owner's feeling.

The maiden's time would one day come to an end.<br>But her waiting would not.<br>The short hand seemed to be constantly chasing after the long hand.<br>Much like the incessant longing that filled the maiden's heart and mind.

Years after the event, she still remembered the knight she met that day.<br>The [[Bloodstained Knight|white knight]] that came for her. The white knight she had been waiting for ever since.
